s2249: Eight. Entered Qin, set up wine.
s2250: Chu You Wang Dao first year
s2252: Twenty-eight. Entered Qin, set up wine.
s2255: Eleven. Lu Bu Wei of He Nan. Wang Jian struck Ye, Yan Yu, took nine cities.
s2258: Nine. Qin pulled our Yan Yu, Ye, took nine cities.
s2264: Twelve. Sent four jun troops assisted Wei struck Chu. Lu Bu Wei died. Again restored Lao Ai retainers moved Shu.
s2265: Eight. Qin assisted us struck Chu.
s2273: Thirteen. Huan Yi struck Ping Yang, killed Zhao Hu Zhe, beheaded one hundred thousand, then east struck. Zhao Wang of He Nan. Comet appeared.
s2276: Two. Qin pulled our Ping Yang, defeated Hu Zhe, . beheaded one hundred thousand.
s2282: Fourteen. Huan Yi pacified Ping Yang, Wu Cheng, Yi An. Han sent Fei came, we killed Fei. Han Wang requested to be subject.
s2285: Three. Qin pulled our Yi An.
s2291: Fifteen. Raised army to Ye. Army to Tai Yuan. Took Lang Meng.
s2294: Four. Qin pulled our Lang Meng, Bo Wu, . army Ye.
s2296: Twenty-three. Crown prince Dan hostage in Qin, fled came back.
s2300: Sixteen. Established Li Yi. Sent troops received Han Nan Yang.
s2306: Twenty-five. Crown prince Dan fled to Yan.
s2307: Seventeen. Attacked Han, took Yang Cheng, Fu Shu. Broke Zhao army.
s2310: Six. Qin pulled our Yang Cheng, Fu Shu.
s2313: Seventeen. Han Wang gave land submitted seal, requested to be vassal minister, sent Han Fei to visit. Qin people detained Fei, then killed him.
s2317: Twenty-six. Yan sent Jing Ke to assassinate Qin Wang.
s2318: Eighteen. Han Fei envoy to Qin, Qin killed Fei.
s2320: Ten. Qin pulled our Ping Yang.
s2321: Twenty-seven. Qin defeated our Jing Ke.
s2322: Nineteen. Huan Yi attacked Zhao, defeated Zhao army at Ping Yang.
s2325: Eleven. Qin pulled our Ping Yang.
s2326: Twenty-eight. Qin defeated us at Ping Yang.
s2327: Twenty. Huan Yi attacked Zhao, took Yi An, Ping Yang.

s2332: Twenty-nine. Qin took our Yi An, Ping Yang.

s2338: Thirteen. Qin pulled our Gao Du, Ji.
s2339: Thirty. Qin took our Gao Du, Ji.

s2346: Fourteen. Qin pulled our Chen south to Ping Yu.
s2347: Thirty-one. Qin took our Chen south to Ping Yu.
s2352: Twenty-three. Wang Jian attacked Wei, took Wu Cheng.
s2356: Fifteen. Qin pulled our Wu Cheng.
s2357: Thirty-two. Qin took our Wu Cheng.
